column1: Uchi////11. (Regular Menu) Brussel Sprouts - A huge portion
column2: definitely worth trying if you're with a larger party
column3: almost a bit too much if you're splitting between a couple. Everything you have heard about these brussel sprouts is true though
column4: they are truly addicting (just like Lay's
column5: you can't eat just one). Definitely the best brussel sprout dish I have ever had - 4.5
